DOC.brief_summary: An Open-label , Single arm , Multicenter Phase 2 Study Bruton 's Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor ibrutinib Patients Relapsed Refractory Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia Small Lymphocytic Lymphoma 17p Deletion
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter Phase 2 Study Ibrutinib Patients With Relapsed Refractory Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia ( CLL ) Small Lymphocytic Lymphoma ( SLL ) With 17p Deletion
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , international , open-label , single arm , Phase 2 study design evaluate efficacy safety ibrutinib subject relapsed/refractory CLL SLL del 17p . All subject receive ibrutinib disease progression unacceptable toxicity occur .
DOC.criteria: Key Documentation del ( 17p13.1 ) Must relapse refractory CLL/SLL receive least 1 prior line systemic therapy . Measurable nodal disease compute tomography ( CT ) Key History current evidence Richter 's transformation prolymphocytic leukemia Prior hematologic stem cell transplantation < 6 month study enrollment ongoing GVHD Prior exposure ibrutinib
